title: Pollution characteristics and risk assessment of endocrine-disrupting chemicals in surface water of national (freshwater) aquatic germplasm resource reserves in Guangdong Province
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00425F, Paper
Tao Zhou, Jie Li, Weizhen Zhang, Yanyi Zeng, Yuan Gao, Haiyan Li, Wanling Yang, Yongzhan Mai, Qianfu Liu, Hu Caiqin, Chao Wang
The distribution, composition, and risk assessment of 8 EDCs in surface water of 14 national aquatic germplasm resources reserve (freshwater) were investigated during dry and wet seasons. Bisphenol A (BPA),...
